info.author: Martin Pengelly-Phillips
info.description:
#######
Harmony
#######

A framework for managing asset schemas and dynamically building UI's and
database fields from them.

*************
Issue tracker
*************

Found a bug? Have an idea on how to make the tool better?

Post it at https://github.com/4degrees/harmony/issues

A framework for managing asset schemas and dynamically building UI’s and database fields from them.
